circumference module¶

circumference.circ_circle(r)¶

Circumference of circle.

Calculate the circumference of a circle based on the radius.

Parameters

r (float) – radius of circle

Returns

circumference of circle

Return type

float

circumference.circ_square(l)¶

Calculates the circumference of a square.

Calculates the circumference of a square based on the lenth of side.

Parameters

l (float) – l is the lengths of side of a square.

Returns

circumference of the square.

Return type

float

Area and Circumference of square + circle
